level.heading: Joint administration by Mayor and Board of Education; rules.
level.text: The Mayor and the Board of Education shall jointly administer this subchapter and each shall issue rules pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, to carry out its purposes.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 38-604.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-66
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-66, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 38-601.
